description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Powa volley is a 2D volley game with eight original characters, each having a unique ability that can give the player an advantage in a point. You can play on four different fields, each having special gameplay elements. And you can choose to play in different game modes, such as, quick play, classic mode, story mode, tournament and you can improve your skills with five challenging mini games.
